port.description: The port to for the dev-server to listen on.

mode.description: Mode to run the server in.

sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving `HTTPS`.

sslCert.description: SSL certificate to use for serving `HTTPS`.

proxyConfig.description: Path to proxy configuration file. For more information, see https://rspack.rs/config/dev-server#devserverproxy.

publicHost.description: Public URL where the application will be served.
